title: Eremo di San Michele (Coli)
description: The cavern of San Michele was a hermit's dwelling place that is located near a cavern known as the "cave of San Colombano". This hermitage lies in a relatively solitary area of the valley of the Curiasca di San Michele stream, a tributary of the Trebbia river (Italian municipality of Coli, province of Piacenza).

properties.title: OSM location of Eremo San Michele
